title: Maud Martha - mother looks at her "quickly"

content.prompt: In the second sentence of the fifteenth paragraph, Maud Martha’s mother looks at Maud Martha “quickly” because she

choices.label: thinks fleetingly that her daughter is mocking her
is unusually preoccupied with the impending return of Papa
wants to see whether Maud Martha is trying to hide her embarrassment
has no more time to deal with Maud Martha’s ill temper

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe how textual details reveal nuances and complexities in characters' relationships with one another.
